```{r}
recent_data_curated <- recent_data[4:nrow(recent_data), 5:ncol(recent_data)]
colnames(recent_data_curated) <- recent_data[3, 5:ncol(recent_data)]
recent_data_curated <- recent_data_curated %>%
  t() %>%
  type.convert() %>%
  as.data.frame()



means <- apply(recent_data_curated, 1, function (x){mean(x, na.rm=TRUE)})
years <- rownames(recent_data_curated) %>% as.numeric()
recent_data_curated <- cbind(recent_data_curated, means, years)

ggplot(recent_data_curated, aes(x=years, y=means)) +
  geom_point()
```
